info.author: Michael J. Pomraning
info.description:
fdsend is yet another SCM_RIGHTS file descriptor passing abstraction.  This
package offers a few conveniences not commonly found together in other
abstractions:  sending multiple files at once, sending arbitrary data, and
working with both files and file descriptors, etc.
info.keywords: file descriptor passing fd sendmsg cmsg msghdr
info.name: fdsend
info.html_description: fdsend is yet another SCM_RIGHTS file descriptor passing abstraction. This package offers a few conveniences not commonly found together in other abstractions: sending multiple files at once, sending arbitrary data, and working with both files and file descriptors, etc.
